Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author: William Howell Brief: controller file that contains all program code and methods that will be used by the GUI. contains private variables and initializes the program.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Controller()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addEmployee()
      Brief: This method will add an employee when the button is pressed.

      brief:Method that adds a product into the database using a prepared sql statement.

      brief: Method that connects the database to the GUI
      void initialize()
      brief:Initializes the program and populates the program with items from the database.
      void loadEmployees()
      Brief: this method loads employees into the employee text area
      java.lang.String productIDtoName​(ProductionRecord productionRecord)
      This method will select the products name where the ID is the same as the productionRecords ID.
      java.lang.String readPassword​(java.io.BufferedReader reader)
      Brief: reads password from reader and returns what was found.
      void recordProduction()
      Brief: Method that records the production of an item that is chosen in the Produce tab.
      java.lang.String reverseString​(java.lang.String pw)

      Brief: initializes the array list that holds the amount of a certain item type already produced.

      Brief: init the password that was found in the file.

      • setArraylist

        public void setArraylist()
        Brief: initializes the array list that holds the amount of a certain item type already produced. This is used for the serial number to have different ending digits per type.

      • productIDtoName

        public java.lang.String productIDtoName​(ProductionRecord productionRecord)
        This method will select the products name where the ID is the same as the productionRecords ID.
        Parameters:
        productionRecord - - takes a production record item.
        Returns:
        String "products name"

        Brief: reads password from reader and returns what was found.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
